usefulItems: aluminum foil, casserole dish (9 in. x 13 in. x 2 in.), oven
title: Meat and Rice Casserole

ingredients.content: ½ oz fresh basil leaves (approx. 4 sprigs, 40 leaves)

preparations.content: Place basil, parsley, Pecorino cheese and dried tomato into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 9<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place onions, garlic and olive oil into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and cook, without measuring cup <b>5 min/250°F/speed 1<b>.
Add ground beef and break up meat with spatula.

Add crushed tomatoes, 8 oz water, stock paste, 1 tsp salt and the pepper. Place simmering basket instead of measuring cup on mixing bowl lid and cook <b>30 min/212°F//speed <b> . Transfer meat sauce to a bowl and set aside.

Place remaining 35 oz water and ½ tsp salt into mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and weigh in rice. Remove simmering basket with rice and rinse rice under cold running water until water runs clear. Mix well with spatula, reinsert simmering basket with rinsed rice and steam <b>18 min/212°F/speed 4<b>. Remove simmering basket with spatula and mix rice with reserved cheese, herbs and dried tomato.

Place half the rice mixture into a casserole dish (approx. 9 in. x 13 in. x 2 in.), add the reserved meat sauce and cover with remaining rice. Cover with aluminum foil and bake 15 minutes (400°F). Serve immediately with salad.

hintsAndTricks: Replace beef stock paste and 8 oz of water with 8 oz beef broth.
If using sun dried tomatoes in oil, drain tomatoes on paper towels and continue with recipe.
